adDetails: This is a free sevice-I am a very discreet, professional that likes to hunt wild pigs only. I do not hunt indigenes animals, only boar. I hunt only for my own consumption, not for a living. So if you have a pig problem, need just one adult to help you with your pig problem, I am your person. I am a licensed hunter, follow all wild game laws and use pig tags, so there is never an issue. Thanks-
